name: CHEYNAIR AVIATION TRAINING SERVICES, INC
about: CheynAir Aviation Training Services, Inc., located at the Mactan-Cebu International Airport, offers high-quality flight training and ground courses for aspiring pilots. With a commitment to excellence, the school provides training for Private Pilot Licence (PPL), Night Rating, and Commercial Pilot Licence (CPL), as well as instrument rating courses. Promoting equal opportunity for all students, CheynAir Aviation has a proven track record with a diverse group of international graduates now successful in the airline industry. The school's strategic location and comprehensive training programs make it an ideal choice for those pursuing a career or passion in aviation. CheynAir Aviation is dedicated to helping aspiring pilots achieve their dreams with professionalism and integrity.
services:
["Private Pilot 
Commercial Pilot 
Flight Instructor
Multi Crew Cooperation
Instrument Rating 
Multi-Engine Rating"]
